hero.title: Front-End & Full Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: Creator of innovative digital solutions
hero.description: I am Minhaj, a passionate developer who creates high-performance web and mobile applications for companies and startups that want to stand out in the digital world.
hero.specialization: Specialized in Next.js, Spring Boot and Flutter. I transform your ideas into digital solutions that convert and engage your users.

services.title: What I bring to you
services.subtitle: Solid skills and concrete solutions, adapted to your needs in business or on mission

web_apps.title: Web Applications
web_apps.description: I develop modern web applications with Next.js and Spring Boot. Passionate about creating elegant user interfaces and performant backend APIs that deliver exceptional user experiences.

apis.title: Backend APIs
apis.description: I design and develop robust RESTful APIs with Spring Boot and Java. Specialized in database integration and efficient data management for scalable applications.

mobile_apps.title: Mobile Applications
mobile_apps.description: I create cross-platform mobile applications with Flutter and React Native. My goal: develop smooth and performant native interfaces on iOS and Android.

cloud_infrastructure.title: Cloud Deployment
cloud_infrastructure.description: I master application deployment on Firebase, Supabase and Vercel. Optimal configuration of databases and cloud services to ensure performance and reliability.

databases.title: Databases
databases.description: I design and optimize PostgreSQL and SQLite databases. Expertise in complex SQL queries and performance optimization for fast and efficient applications.

agile_collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
agile_collaboration.description: I collaborate effectively in teams with GitHub, actively participate in code reviews and apply agile methodologies. Always ready to learn and share my knowledge.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: I document my code clearly and communicate effectively on technical aspects. I enjoy explaining complex concepts in an accessible way and working in synergy with the team.

innovative_solutions.title: Problem Solving
innovative_solutions.description: I love analyzing and solving complex technical problems. Curious and persevering, I actively seek innovative solutions and quickly learn new technologies.

tech_watch.title: Technology Watch
tech_watch.description: I am passionate about new technologies and frameworks. Constantly monitoring, I continuously learn and quickly adapt to web development evolutions to stay up to date.

testing_quality.title: Testing & Quality
testing_quality.description: I write unit and integration tests to ensure code quality. Committed to best practices, I strive to continuously improve the robustness and maintainability of applications.

web_sites.title: Web Development
web_sites.description: Monthly support for the development and evolution of your websites with Next.js and Spring Boot. Continuous support and iterative development adapted to your needs.

mobile_applications.title: Mobile Applications
mobile_applications.description: Monthly development and maintenance of mobile applications with Flutter and React Native. Continuous evolution of your cross-platform application.

proactive_maintenance.title: Maintenance & Support
proactive_maintenance.description: Technical support and proactive maintenance of your applications. Bug fixes, security updates and continuous improvements.

performance_optimization.title: Performance Optimization
performance_optimization.description: Continuous improvement of your web application performance. Monthly code optimization, loading speed and user experience enhancement.

secure_deployment.title: Deployment & DevOps
secure_deployment.description: Monthly management of your application deployment with Vercel, Firebase and Supabase. Configuration, monitoring and continuous security.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: My journey
about.description: Discover my professional journey and web development skills

profile.title: My profile
profile.paragraph1: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Minhaj, a developer passionate about code, but also about concrete and ambitious projects.
profile.paragraph2: I love continuous learning, taking on technical challenges and seeing an idea come to life through development.
profile.paragraph3: Beyond code, I'm interested in entrepreneurship (apps, real estate, financial independence) and I like projects that have a real impact. I'm also passionate about sports and self-improvement: progressing a little more each day is my philosophy, both in the gym and behind my keyboard.
profile.paragraph4: ðŸ’¡ What drives me: Transforming an idea into a real solution. Building my life goals step by step. Growing as a developer, but also as a person. Today, I'm looking for projects or a team where I can contribute with my energy, curiosity and determination.
